SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE RELEASE NOTES AND UPGRADE GUIDE
Rapidly Customize Your Experience with Open-Source Component Code

If you want to extend the default B2B Commerce Header component for B2B Commerce for Visualforce and customize its default behavior, you can get started quickly. Open-source code for the component is available in a public Github repository. Download the source code and start building your ideal Experience Builder site in just a few clicks!

Where: This change applies to B2B Commerce for Visualforce Winter ’21 (version 4.13) in Lightning Experience and Salesforce Classic in Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions.

How: After you upgrade the managed package, the default B2B Commerce Header component is available to use, and styled for the Capricorn Coffee demo theme. However, because the component is managed code, the component that the managed package installs isn’t customizable.

To customize the default component for your Experience Builder site, visit https://github.com/forcedotcom/b2b-commerce-for-visualforce and download the open-source version component code.

TIP For other components, including the B2B Commerce Header component in B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’20 (version 4.12) or earlier, the code isn’t open-source. To request access to the source code for those components, submit a Support & Services case.

title: Rapidly Customize Your B2B Commerce Experience with Open-Source Code
